workflows.name: Ship a SaaS MVP
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow to scope, build, test, and ship a SaaS MVP quickly.

steps.title: Plan the scope
steps.goal: Convert the idea into a clear implementation plan and milestones.
steps.notes: Define problem, user persona, MVP boundaries, and acceptance criteria before coding.

steps.title: Build backend and API
steps.goal: Implement the core data model, API contracts, and auth baseline.
steps.notes: Prefer small vertical slices; keep API contracts explicit and testable.

steps.title: Build frontend
steps.goal: Deliver the primary user flows with production-grade UX patterns.
steps.notes: Prioritize onboarding, empty states, and one complete happy-path flow.

steps.title: Test and validate
steps.goal: Catch regressions and ensure key flows work before release.
steps.notes: Use automated testing for critical paths. Manual testing for UX.

steps.title: Ship safely
steps.goal: Release with basic observability and rollback readiness.
steps.notes: Define release checklist, minimum telemetry, and rollback triggers.

workflows.name: Security Audit for a Web App
workflows.description: Structured workflow for baseline AppSec review and risk triage.

steps.title: Define scope and threat model
steps.goal: Identify what you're protecting and what threats matter most.
steps.notes: Use STRIDE or ATTACK framework. Focus on critical assets.

steps.title: Authenticate and authorize
steps.goal: Verify authentication is strong and authorization is enforced.
steps.notes: Check for broken authn (weak passwords, session fixation), broken authz (privilege escalation).

steps.title: Input validation and injection prevention
steps.goal: Ensure all inputs are validated and no injections are possible.
steps.notes: Check SQL, XSS, LDAP, OS command injection.

steps.title: Secrets and data protection
steps.goal: Verify secrets are never exposed and sensitive data is encrypted.
steps.notes: Check for hardcoded credentials, unencrypted storage, data in logs.

steps.title: Report and prioritize
steps.goal: Document findings and create remediation roadmap.
steps.notes: Prioritize by CVSS severity. Start with critical and high.

workflows.name: Build and Optimize Data ETL Pipelines
workflows.description: Design, implement, and optimize data pipelines for analytics and ML.

steps.title: Define data requirements
steps.goal: Understand sources, transformation needs, and destination requirements.
steps.notes: Map data sources, identify business logic, define SLAs.

steps.title: Design pipeline architecture
steps.goal: Choose orchestration tool and design workflow topology.
steps.notes: Consider Airflow, Temporal, or cloud-native options. Plan error handling.

steps.title: Implement transformations
steps.goal: Build ETL logic with data quality checks.
steps.notes: Write testable, maintainable code. Include data validation.

steps.title: Optimize performance
steps.goal: Monitor runtime and reduce latency and cost.
steps.notes: Profile bottlenecks. Use caching and parallelization where appropriate.

steps.title: Deploy and monitor
steps.goal: Release to production with comprehensive monitoring.
steps.notes: Set up alerts for failures. Track SLAs and performance.

workflows.name: Train and Deploy ML Models
workflows.description: End-to-end ML workflow from data preparation to production deployment.

steps.title: Define problem and metrics
steps.goal: Understand what to predict and how to measure success.
steps.notes: Define success metrics clearly (accuracy, precision, recall, F1).

steps.title: Prepare and explore data
steps.goal: Clean, transform, and understand your dataset.
steps.notes: Handle missing values, outliers, class imbalance.

steps.title: Engineer features and train model
steps.goal: Build features and train baseline and advanced models.
steps.notes: Start simple (baseline), then iterate. Use cross-validation.

steps.title: Evaluate and optimize
steps.goal: Test model performance and hyperparameter tuning.
steps.notes: Use train/validation/test split. Avoid overfitting.

steps.title: Deploy and monitor
steps.goal: Release model to production with drift detection.
steps.notes: Monitor for data drift and prediction drift. Set up retraining triggers.

workflows.name: Migrate to Cloud Infrastructure
workflows.description: Plan and execute migration of on-premise systems to cloud.

steps.title: Assess current state
steps.goal: Inventory systems and understand dependencies.
steps.notes: Document current architecture, performance baselines, and dependencies.

steps.title: Design cloud architecture
steps.goal: Plan cloud infrastructure using IaC.
steps.notes: Choose cloud provider, services, and deployment model.

steps.title: Build infrastructure
steps.goal: Provision cloud infrastructure using Terraform.
steps.notes: Use IaC for repeatability. Test in staging first.

steps.title: Migrate data and applications
steps.goal: Move systems to cloud with minimal downtime.
steps.notes: Plan for data consistency. Consider blue-green deployment.

steps.title: Optimize and hand off
steps.goal: Right-size resources and establish operational processes.
steps.notes: Monitor costs. Set up runbooks and alerting. Train ops team.
